Terms of Service

Effective Date: 3rd Oct. 2023

Welcome to Runam and Runup technologies ("Company," "we," "us," or "our"). Please read these Terms of Service ("Terms") carefully before using our digital social media services, events ticketing, and bills payment platform ("Services"). By accessing or using our Services, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree with these Terms, please do not use our Services.

1. Use of Services:

You may use our Services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. You are responsible for all activities conducted under your account.

2. Privacy Policy:

Your use of our Services is also governed by our Privacy Policy, which can be found at privacy policy section of our website. Please review this policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

3. Payment:

You agree to pay all fees associated with the use of our Services as described on our platform. Payments are processed securely through third-party payment processors.

4. Intellectual Property:

All content and materials provided through our Services, including logos, trademarks, software, and digital content, are the property of Runam and Runup technologies or its licensors and are protected by intellectual property laws.

5. Prohibited Activities:

You agree not to engage in any of the following activities:

- Violating any applicable laws or regulations.

- Using our Services for illegal, fraudulent, or harmful purposes.

- Attempting to gain unauthorized access to our systems or user accounts.

- Reverse engineering or attempting to decompile our software.

6. Termination:

We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your access to our Services at our sole discretion, without notice, for any reason, including if we believe you have violated these Terms.

7. Disclaimer of Warranties:

Our Services are provided "as is" and "as available." We make no warranties, expressed or implied, regarding the quality, accuracy, or availability of our Services.

8. Limitation of Liability:

To the fullest extent permitted by law, we are not liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or for any loss of profits or revenues.

9. Governing Law:

These Terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of federal republic of Nigeria. You consent to the exclusive jurisdiction and venue of the courts located in federal republic of Nigeria for any disputes arising out of or relating to these Terms.

10. Changes to Terms:

We reserve the right to update or modify these Terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on our platform. Your continued use of our Services after any changes constitutes your acceptance of the revised Terms.

By using our Services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to these Terms. If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms, please contact us at Info@runamapp.com

Thank you for choosing Runam and runup technologies. We appreciate your business and look forward to serving you.
